verses.text: Give unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, O ye mighty, give unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** glory and strength.+ 29.1 ye mighty: Heb. ye sons of the mighty*

Give unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** the glory due unto his name; worship the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** in the beauty of holiness.+ 29.2 the glory…: Heb. the honour of his name*+ 29.2 in…: or, in his glorious sanctuary*
The voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* upon the waters: the God of glory thundereth: the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* upon many waters.+ 29.3 many: or, great*
The voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* powerful; the voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* full of majesty.+ 29.4 powerful: Heb. in power*+ 29.4 full…: Heb. in majesty*
The voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** breaketh the cedars; yea, the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** breaketh the cedars of Lebanon.
He maketh them also to skip like a calf; Lebanon and Sirion like a young unicorn.
The voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** divideth the flames of fire.+ 29.7 divideth: Heb. cutteth out*
The voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shaketh the wilderness; the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** shaketh the wilderness of Kadesh.

The voice of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** maketh the hinds to calve, and discovereth the forests: and in his temple doth every one speak of his* glory.+ 29.9 to calve: or, to be in pain*+ 29.9 doth…: or, every whit of it uttereth, etc*
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** sitteth upon the flood; yea, the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** sitteth King for ever.
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** will give strength unto his people; the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** will bless his people with peace.
